name: Interconection (Jam version)
description:
Controls: 

Movement with W,A,S,D.

Aim with your mouse, hold and hover the charger and launch your boomerang.

Make sure your boomerang arrives to the end of its journey safe.

You have 60 seconds to finish it!

This game was submited for the One minute Jam! Hope you like it! c:

This game was made by the Deer friends!

@ZhucklyDev

Aetherrevival
